alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 7:47PM PST until February 22 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Lower Columbia. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Below 500 feet, snow accumulations will be spotty and will likely vary considerably. Roads that remain wet Wednesday evening will likely freeze by Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
